climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day Honeysuckle air freshener spray is made with essential oils and other thoughtfully chosen ingredients, and gives your home instant freshening between cleaning days
Delivered in a non-aerosol spray to quickly freshen any room
Mrs. Meyer's products are made with cruelty-free formulas and are Leaping Bunny certified
Garden-inspired Honeysuckle blossoms fill the air with tempting sweet scent - a charming mix of flowers and fruits. So serene and sunny
Mrs. Meyer's air freshener for home has thoughtfully chosen ingredients and is made without propellants, phthalates, parabens, or artificial colors
body.description: Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day Room Fresheners are specifically made to quickly freshen any room, while also providing a special, singular scent for your home. The Honeysuckle scented room freshener fills the air with a tempting sweet scent - a charming mix of flowers and fruits. So serene and sunny! The non-aerosol bottle quickly freshens any room for instant fragrance. This room freshener is made with essential oil, and other thoughtfully chosen ingredients. Perfect for when you need to add a little garden-inspired fragrance to your home between cleaning days. Made without propellants, phthalates, parabens, or artificial colors - and of course, always a cruelty free formula room air freshener. Bottles (less trigger) made with at least 30% post-consumer plastic. Also available in other garden-inspired scents and products such as candles, laundry detergent, dish packs, and so much more! Mrs. Meyer's - Rooted in Goodness.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Making The World a More Compassionate Place One Garden At A Time Mrs. Meyer’s Clean Day products are inspired by the garden, which is why we’re inspired to plant flowers, plants and trees. At Mrs. Meyer’s, we have a passion for the environment. We also know the importance of being a good neighbor in our home, our community and our world. That’s why we’ve made a commitment to improving the earth one flower, plant and tree at a time through our campaigns, partnerships, volunteering efforts and donations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wasn’t sure if l would like this scent. I was also skeptical that the scent would last but I was so pleasantly surprised! It smells amazing! Clean! And it lasts. Covers up the dog smell which is inevitable when you have dogs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The BEST smell!
reviews.reviewText: I use this everywhere, I’m obsessed with the smell! I have a 5 month old baby & a dog, so I’m mindful about the products we’re using to ensure it’s non-toxic. I love the natural ingredients and feel it does a great job cleaning all surfaces!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Breathing Easy with Mrs. Meyer's Honeysuckle Room and Air Freshener Spray!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased Mrs. Meyer's Room and Air Freshener Spray, and it has become a fast favorite in our household. The product’s eco-friendly design and simple ingredient list immediately stood out to me, aligning perfectly with our preference for natural and sustainable options.The non-aerosol design is a big win, as it aligns with my commitment to environmentally friendly choices. It's not often you find a company that values both the quality of their products and the impact they have on the environment, and Mrs. Meyer's seems to have achieved that balance.The 8 fl. oz. Honeysuckle spray has an absolutely delightful scent. Infused with essential oils, it brings a refreshing and pleasant aroma to any room without being too overpowering. It’s a delicate balance that many air fresheners fail to achieve, but Mrs. Meyer's has it down to a fine art. My spouse and I both agree - it smells wonderful!What sets Mrs. Meyer's Room and Air Freshener Spray apart is its ability to gently neutralize odors rather than just masking them with a strong fragrance. The resulting fresh and natural honeysuckle scent genuinely elevates the atmosphere in our home.In conclusion, Mrs. Meyer's Room and Air Freshener Spray hits all the right notes. It successfully combines effectiveness, environmental responsibility, and a wonderful fragrance. We're definitely eager to explore other scents in their range. This is a top-tier recommendation for anyone in search of a delightful and eco-friendly air freshener.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: East to use spray bottle and product lasts a long time. I use it in my bathroom. This is a reorder.Try it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I sprayed five times in a 500 square foot area and had to open a window. It's very strong! The other floral smells like popuri but this one smells like honeysuckle, jasmine, and splash of citrus. Like all scented sprays, it doesn't mask odor, so take the trash out or it will smell like flowery trash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Scent is very different from past purchases
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this scent multiple times over the years because It had become my absolute favorite in their line of air fresheners. It has always been consistent in the way it smells...except for this purchase. Although it still has a fairly pleasant scent, it doesn't smell like the Honeysuckle that I had been accustomed to. This one smells more herbaceous and earthy, as opposed to having a floral fragrance. An entirely different experience. I don't use it as often because of this, and now I am a bit nervous about ordering it again and being disappointed that I will receive another one that does not smell like it should.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
